definition: of or relating to Scandinavia or its peoples or cultures, a person from Scandinavia or of Scandinavian descent
details:
adjective
- of or relating to Scandinavia or its peoples or cultures
= example: of or relating to Scandinavia or its peoples or cultures
= synonyms: Norse
noun
- a person from Scandinavia or of Scandinavian descent
= example: a person from Scandinavia or of Scandinavian descent
